statements.select: SELECT * FROM (select ROW_NUMBER() Over(order by a.LastUpdateTime desc) as rowNum, a.*,b.ImageUrl from T_CTW_LEventTheme as a left join ObjectImages as b on a.ImageId=b.ImageId and b.IsDelete=0 where a.IsDelete=0 and a.TemplateId=#TemplateId# ) as t where rowNum > #StartPage# and rowNum <= #EndPage#
select *,null as ImageUrl from T_CTW_LEventTheme where IsDelete=0 and ThemeName=#ThemeName# and TemplateId=#TemplateId#
select count(1) From T_CTW_LEventTheme where IsDelete=0 and TemplateId=#TemplateId#
select *,null as ImageUrl from T_CTW_LEventTheme where IsDelete=0 and ThemeId=#ThemeId#
statements.insert: insert into T_CTW_LEventTheme( ThemeId ,TemplateId ,ThemeName ,ImageId ,H5Url ,H5TemplateId ,RCodeUrl ,CreateTime ,CreateBy ,LastUpdateTime ,LastUpdateBy ,IsDelete) VALUES ( #ThemeId#, #TemplateId#, #ThemeName#, #ImageId#, #H5Url#, #H5TemplateId#,#RCodeUrl# ,GetDate(), #CreateBy#, GetDate(), #LastUpdateBy#,0 )
statements.update: update T_CTW_LEventTheme set ThemeName=#ThemeName# ,ImageId=#ImageId# ,H5Url=#H5Url# ,H5TemplateId=#H5TemplateId# ,LastUpdateTime=Getdate() ,LastUpdateBy=#LastUpdateBy# where ThemeId=#ThemeId#
update T_CTW_LEventTheme set IsDelete=1 ,LastUpdateTime=Getdate() ,LastUpdateBy=#LastUpdateBy# where ThemeId=#ThemeId#
